body:
Seen as there is no Ask the Staff section anymore i figured this was the place to put this topic.

So who decides which mini-games are added is it Funky or a map developer or someone else
body_tagged:
Seen as there is no Ask the Staff section anymore i figured this was the place to put this topic.

So who decides which mini-games are added is it Funky or a map developer or someone else
title: Who chooses the mini-games?

replies.body: Funky codes the mini-games. He works alone.
replies.body_tagged: Funky codes the mini-games. He works alone.

replies.body: ahh so he chooses which ones are accepted and which ones denined
replies.body_tagged: ahh so he chooses which ones are accepted and which ones denined

replies.body: Well, kind of, the minigame committee doesn't exist any more, Funky most likely works with his map devs on minigames.
replies.body_tagged: Well, kind of, the minigame committee doesn't exist any more, Funky most likely works with his map devs on minigames.

replies.body: Aha its just ive had a minigame idea post open for a while and when funky's on he hasn't replied to my pos
replies.body_tagged: Aha its just ive had a minigame idea post open for a while and when funky's on he hasn't replied to my pos
